attributes.action: £1 from each person each week then share it out
attributes.additional_details:
Take £1 off each person each week then make Millionairs over ten years at £100,000 each year with a pension at the end. winners would be taken out of the government system for pension dole SS
Wrong doers would pay back .
Fully backed by the Government
32000 winners over ten years
150000 payments in ten years.
64000 winners over 20 years
Not all winners in one area
Rules and winners on TV with their N/I number so you know if your number is drawn.
Government get £250.000 at your death.
